original_text:
He chose the best land for himself;
    the leader’s portion was kept for him.
When the heads of the people assembled,
    he carried out the Lord’s righteous will,
    and his judgments concerning Israel.”
korean_text: 그가 자기를 위하여 먼저 기업을 택하였으니 곧 입법자의 분깃으로 준비된 것이로다 그가 백성의 수령들과 함께 와서 여호와의 공의와 이스라엘과 세우신 법도를 행하도다

sentences.original_text: He chose the best land for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 위해 최고의 땅을 선택했다

sentences.original_text: the leader's portion was kept for him
When the heads of the people assembled
he carried out the Lord's righteous will
